name: Godf
description:
Do thou love God Games ? Do thou love Golf ? Thus, Godf is a game created for you !

Godf is a game where thou have to guide souls to the heavens by terraforming the world around them. But beware of the dangerous lava that would bring the souls into a never ending hell.

Everything is controlled with the mouse, it is (almost) as simple as that! May you guide the poor lost souls to the promised land.
